subject: Re: ConfigurableTestCase
msgSnippet: ... to be any ... like ... It s part of junit++ http://www.ddj.com/ftp/2001/2001_02/junitpp.zip It doesn t have a servlet equivalent
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., Anuj Agrawal <agrawal@l...> wrote:
> Where can i download the ConfigurableTestCase from? Doesn't appear
to be any
> links from the junit.org site. 8(
>
> Also, is there an equivalent of that for ServletTestCase - something
like
> ConfigurableServletTestCase ?
>
> Thanks.
> Anuj.

It's part of junit++
http://www.ddj.com/ftp/2001/2001_02/junitpp.zip

It doesn't have a servlet equivalent
